column4: Can someone help me out when a wireless problem when they're free?
(sorry, I've not been here in a while)
So. I can't access my home network over wireless. It looks like the card associating with the AP, but I'm not getting an IP address.
ok, did you try to manually set the network stuff or use the network-manager?
network-manager keeps asking me over and over again for a WEP key -- which I provide -- it looks like it associates -- and then it asks me again after about one minute
It might be an issue with dhcdbd, because I find: "dhcdbd: Unrequested down ?:3" in .var.log/messages
might try the driver from here?? http://intellinuxwireless.org/
